field_mychart_visit_type_heading.label: Open Scheduling Widget Heading Text
field_mychart_visit_type_heading.name: mychart_visit_type_heading
field_mychart_visit_type_heading.instructions:
This sets the text of the heading in the window that appears with the open scheduling widget.
Use a very short action phrase that makes the purpose of this specific scheduling widget clear to the user. Do not just use the name of a condition or treatment.

field_mychart_visit_type_intro.label: Specific Open Scheduling Widget Introduction (Optional Override)
field_mychart_visit_type_intro.name: mychart_visit_type_intro
field_mychart_visit_type_intro.instructions:
You can define a value here to replace the main section introduction (defined by General MyChart Open Scheduling Widget Introduction) if that general introduction does not adequately introduce this specific widget.
If used, this paragraph should provide general information about MyChart open scheduling and a brief overview of anything necessary for users to know about this specific scheduling widget.
There is a 221 character limit.

field_mychart_visit_type_link_text.label: Open Scheduling Widget Link Text
field_mychart_visit_type_link_text.name: mychart_visit_type_link_text
field_mychart_visit_type_link_text.instructions:
You can define a value here to replace the main section introduction (defined by General MyChart Open Scheduling Widget Introduction) if that general introduction does not adequately introduce this specific widget.
If used, this paragraph should provide general information about MyChart open scheduling and a brief overview of anything necessary for users to know about this specific scheduling widget.
There is a 221 character limit.

field_mychart_visit_type_id.label: Visit Type / PRC ID from Epic
field_mychart_visit_type_id.name: mychart_visit_type_id
field_mychart_visit_type_id.instructions:
A single visit type available for scheduling in this specific widget.
Check the External Name field of the visit type record in Epic to ensure it is patient-friendly since it will be visible to users in the open scheduling widget.
